name: Eternal Fate (itch)
description:
Are you ready to seek truth?

Play as a flirtatious teen knight whose past is shadowed in mystery. Gather strong allies to aid you on your journey. Fight evil foes that want only to bring back their ways to the world. Battle it out with your rival who will be a challenge throughout the game. Enjoy humor with jealousy and a "love triangle".

What secrets will you unravel in this epic Old-school RPG.

Welcome to your Eternal Fate.
